AT.name: Super Mario™ 64
AT.description: Rettungsaktion statt Nachmittagskuchen: Als Mario auf Peachs Einladung hin auf ihrem Schloss eintrifft, muss er feststellen, dass die Prinzessin wieder einmal von Bowser und seinen Spießgesellen entführt wurde. Doch diesmal ist alles anders - Mario macht den Sprung in die dritte Dimension! Erforsche Peachs geheimnisvolles Schloss und finde alle 120 Sterne in diesem unvergesslichen Nintendo 64-Launch-Titel. Super Mario 64™ gilt heute als eines der besten Videospiele aller Zeiten und versprüht trotz revolutionärer Innovationen nach wie vor den klassischen Mario-Charme. Trotz Marios enormem Aktionsrepertoire steuert er sich spielend leicht wie eh und je. Super Mario 64™ ist ganz nebenbei auch jener Titel, der den Analog-Stick als Standard-Bedienelement für Videospiele etablierte. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Super Mario™ 64
AU.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. This is also the game that set the analogue stick as a standard for video games. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Super Mario™ 64
BG.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. BE.name: Super Mario™ 64
BE.description: Invité par la princesse Peach dans son château, Mario se rend compte qu'elle a été enlevée par Bowser et ses sbires. Cependant, quelque chose est différent... cette fois l'aventure est en 3D. Découvrez les secrets du château de Peach et trouvez les 120 étoiles en amenant Mario dans une nouvelle dimension avec ce titre inoubliable de la Nintendo 64. Considéré comme l'un des meilleurs jeux de tous les temps, Super Mario 64™ sut rester fidèle à l'esprit de la série, notamment en restant toujours aussi maniable malgré l'ajout de nouveaux mouvements. Ce jeu démontra toute l'utilité du stick directionnel qui devint par la suite un standard dans les jeux vidéo. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Super Mario 64™
CA.description: On a bright, sunny day in the Mushroom Kingdom, Mario goes to visit the princess but finds her castle eerily empty. Leaping through pictures hanging from the walls, he enters 15 magical worlds in a quest to collect the 120 Power Stars pilfered by evil Bowser and save the day. The game's vast worlds teem with daunting obstacle courses, hidden items, puzzles and more than 30 types of enemies. Take advantage of Mario's large selection of moves, including running, jumping, swimming, stomping, punching, and even backward somersaulting! Special caps give him short-lived powers, including the ability to fly. Super Mario 64 features unmatched camera control that makes adventuring in its 3D world a snap, even for newcomers.

ES.name: Super Mario™ 64
ES.description: Invitado por la princesa Peach a su castillo, Mario descubre que la hermosa princesa ha sido una vez más raptada por Bowser y sus secuaces. Sin embargo, esta vez es diferente... ¡Esta vez el mundo es en 3D! ¡Desenmaraña los secretos del castillo de Peach, encuentra las 120 estrellas y descubre con Mario una dimensión completamente nueva en este inolvidable juego de lanzamiento de Nintendo 64! Considerado por muchos el mejor videojuego de todos los tiempos, sigue fiel al espíritu de la serie y, aunque Mario ha sido dotado de muchos movimientos nuevos, sigue siendo igual de fácil de manejar. Este es también el juego que convirtió la palanca analógica en un estándar de los videojuegos. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Super Mario™ 64
IT.description: Invitato al castello della Principessa Peach, Mario scopre che ancora una volta è stata rapita da Bowser e dai suoi scagnozzi. Ma qualcosa è cambiato... Stavolta l’avventura è in 3D! Scopri i segreti del castello della Principessa Peach e trova tutte le 120 stelle mentre guidi Mario in una nuova dimensione in quest’indimenticabile titolo di lancio del Nintendo 64. Considerato da molti come uno dei migliori videogiochi di tutti i tempi, rimane fedele allo spirito della serie e nonostante Mario acquisti molte nuove mosse, resta semplice da controllare. Questo gioco segna anche l’introduzione dello stick analogico come uno standard nei videogiochi. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MX.name: Super Mario 64™
MX.description: Un soleado y brillante día en el Reino Champiñón, Mario decide visitar a la princesa pero encuentra su castillo extrañamente vacío. Sumérgete en los cuadros colgados en las paredes y entra en 15 mágicos mundos en tu búsqueda por recuperar las 120 hiperestrellas hurtadas por el malvado Bowser y salvar el día. Los emocionantes mundos del juego están repletos de intimidantes obstáculos, objetos escondidos, rompecabezas y más de 30 tipos de enemigos. Aprovecha la gran variedad de movimientos de Mario como correr, saltar, nadar, aplastar e incluso realizar impresionantes maromas. Las gorras especiales le ofrecen poderes por un breve periodo de tiempo, incluida la habilidad de volar. Super Mario 64 también ofrece una innovadora manera de controlar el ángulo de la cámara lo que permite que incluso los más novatos puedan explorar su mundo en 3D con facilidad.

NO.name: Super Mario™ 64
NO.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. This is also the game that set the analogue stick as a standard for video games. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Super Mario™ 64
NL.description: Als Mario wordt uitgenodigd in het kasteel, ontdekt hij dat prinses Peach weer eens is ontvoerd door Bowser en zijn handlangers. Maar er is iets veranderd... Het avontuur is driedimensionaal! Ontrafel de geheimen van het kasteel en zoek naar de 120 sterren in deze onvergetelijke releasetitel voor de Nintendo 64. Super Mario 64™ wordt alom beschouwd als een van de beste videogames aller tijden, en hoewel Mario zich op talloze nieuwe manieren kan voortbewegen, is de besturing nog net zo makkelijk als altijd. Dit is bovendien het spel dat ervoor zorgde dat de analoge stick de standaard werd voor videogames. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Super Mario™ 64
NZ.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. PL.name: Super Mario™ 64
PL.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. This is also the game that set the analogue stick as a standard for video games. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Super Mario™ 64
PT.description: Convidado pela princesa Peach a visitar o seu castelo, Mario descobre que a bela princesa foi mais uma vez sequestrada por Bowser e os seus sequazes. Porém, desta vez tudo é diferente... A aventura desenrola-se em 3D! Desvenda os segredos do castelo de Peach, encontra as 120 estrelas e explora com Mario uma dimensão completamente nova neste jogo inesquecível lançado para a Nintendo 64. Considerado por muitos como o melhor videojogo de sempre, este permanece fiel ao espírito da série e ainda que Mario tenha adquirido muitos movimentos novos, ele continua a ser fácil de controlar. Este é também o jogo que ajudou a tornar o manípulo analógico num standard dos videojogos. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Super Mario™ 64
RU.description: Прибыв в замок по приглашению принцессы Пич, Марио обнаруживает, что она в очередной раз была похищена Боузером и его прихвостнями. Но есть одно отличие... Теперь все происходит в формате 3D! Помогите Марио разгадать секреты замка Пич и отыскать все 120 звезд в этом трехмерном приключении, изначально выпущенном для Nintendo 64. Mario 64, которую по праву можно назвать одной из лучших видеоигр всех времен, сохранила общий дух серии, а главный герой, даже овладев множеством новых движений, остался таким же простым в управлении. Кроме того, именно благодаря популярности Mario 64 аналоговый стик стал стандартным элементом игровых систем. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. This is also the game that set the analogue stick as a standard for video games. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

US.name: Super Mario 64™
US.description: On a bright, sunny day in the Mushroom Kingdom, Mario goes to visit the princess but finds her castle eerily empty. Leaping through pictures hanging from the walls, he enters 15 magical worlds in a quest to collect the 120 Power Stars pilfered by evil Bowser and save the day. The game's vast worlds teem with daunting obstacle courses, hidden items, puzzles and more than 30 types of enemies. Take advantage of Mario's large selection of moves, including running, jumping, swimming, stomping, punching, and even backward somersaulting! Special caps give him short-lived powers, including the ability to fly. Super Mario 64 features unmatched camera control that makes adventuring in its 3D world a snap, even for newcomers.

ZA.name: Super Mario™ 64
ZA.description: Invited to Princess Peach's castle, Mario discovers that she has once again been kidnapped by Bowser and his minions. However, something has changed... This time the adventure is in 3D! Unravel the secrets of Peach's castle and find all 120 stars as Mario steps into a whole new dimension for this unforgettable launch title of the Nintendo 64. Widely considered as one of the best video games of all time, it stays faithful to spirit of the series, and although Mario has gained many new moves, he remains as easy to control as ever. This is also the game that set the analogue stick as a standard for video games. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.
